description: Enhance your property's curb appeal with our professional exterior painting services. Our experienced painters handle all outdoor surfaces including walls, fences, decks, and trim. We use weather-resistant, UV-protected paints designed to withstand the UAE's harsh climate, ensuring your exterior looks great for years.
whatToExpect: Our exterior painting process starts with thorough pressure washing and surface preparation. We repair cracks, fill holes, and prime bare surfaces. Using premium exterior paints, our team applies multiple coats for durability. We work efficiently while prioritizing safety and quality, with full cleanup upon completion.

faqs.question: How long does exterior painting take?
faqs.answer: A typical villa exterior takes 5-10 days depending on size, condition, and weather. We work around weather conditions to ensure proper paint adhesion and curing.

faqs.question: What type of paint do you use for exteriors?
faqs.answer: We use premium exterior paints with UV protection and weather resistance, specifically formulated for the UAE climate. These paints resist fading, peeling, and cracking caused by sun exposure and humidity.

faqs.question: Do you pressure wash before painting?
faqs.answer: Yes, pressure washing is included in our exterior painting service. It removes dirt, mold, and loose paint, ensuring the new paint adheres properly for a lasting finish.

faqs.question: Can you paint during summer?
faqs.answer: Yes, but we adjust our schedule to work during cooler parts of the day. Extreme heat can affect paint application, so we take precautions to ensure quality results year-round.

faqs.question: How long will the exterior paint last?
faqs.answer: With quality paint and proper preparation, exterior paint typically lasts 5-8 years in the UAE climate. We provide maintenance tips to extend the life of your paint job.
